thread.title: BRIEF-NN Inc Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.30

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-NN Inc Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.30
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Nn Inc:
* NN, INC. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 * NET SALES FOR Q4 OF 2017 INCREASED $14.5 MILLION, OR 10%, TO $156 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.30, REVENUE VIEW $153.8 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* INCOME (LOSS) FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS IN 2017 WAS FAVORABLY IMPACTED BY $52.3 MILLION OF TAX BENEFIT DUE TO U.S. TAX REFORM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
